short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Beautiful photos & dose of motivation in each new tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Working on computer could be boring, and especially when you do it the whole day. This simple extension brightens up your new tab screen - you will see an inspiring image, especially selected by our team to uplift mood! 

What's more, you will see a tailored quote or a message, to motivate you and enrich you.
